title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.15 - Confidentiality of accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.15 - Confidentiality of accounts

State Regulations

The account wagering licensee, its employees and agents
may not divulge any account information without the express written permission
of the account holder except to the commission, by commission order, or as may
otherwise be prescribed by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.15

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
